feed.title: Vito Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Vito: 2.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add logs:clear command by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/509
  • Add missing php-intl package when installing php by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/510
  • Ensure newly created branches are available for switching by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/511
  • Display repository and branch in site details by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/512
  • Fix prevent "null" from appearing in console after user selection (#501) by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/514
  • Fix regex in File Manager to support hyphenated usernames and groups by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/516
  • Fix variables not being saved in database when executing a script by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/518
  • Implement Site Commands (#298) by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/519
  • Fix console showing null in path by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/525
  • Sail default container name to match docker-compose.yml by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/532
  • Database collations by @RichardAnderson in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/489
  • Fix run_action helper by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/540
  • Add isolated users for switching in Vito console by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/533
  • Add PHPStan level 7 by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/544
  • Add database and database users sync by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/537
  • Add workers to servers by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/547

New Contributors

  • @dyanakiev made their first contribution in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/510

Full Changelog: https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/compare/2.3.0...2.4.0

entry.title: New release for Vito: 2.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add endpoint to update site aliases by @J4Wx in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/551
  • Add endpoint for reading & updating site deployment script by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/562
  • Add redirects to sites by @J4Wx in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/552
  • Add endpoint for triggering site deployment by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/563
  • Add endpoint for reading and updating site .env file by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/564
  • Bump vite from 6.2.0 to 6.2.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/574
  • Fix worker users @J4Wx in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/567
  • Allow reuse of a database name by @J4Wx in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/571
  • Add missing backticks in Blade for MySQL/MariaDB database names with hyphens by @dyanakiev in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/523
  • Bump vite from 6.2.3 to 6.2.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/576
  • Fix aws connect bug by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/577

New Contributors

  • @J4Wx made their first contribution in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/551

Full Changelog: https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/compare/2.4.0...2.5.0

entry.title: New release for Vito: 2.5.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump league/commonmark from 2.6.1 to 2.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/595
  • Revert "fix: add missing backticks in Blade for MySQL/MariaDB database names with hyphens" by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/601

Full Changelog: https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/compare/2.5.0...2.5.1

entry.title: New release for Vito: 2.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add Caddy Server Support Alongside Nginx by @rtraselbd in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/600

Full Changelog: https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/compare/2.5.1...2.6.0

entry.title: New release for Vito: 3.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • laravel 12 upgrade by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/586
  • Setup Inertia by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/593
  • dashboard layout by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/597
  • Export and Import vito settings by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/606
  • reverse proxy basics by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/609
  • Plugins base by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/613
  • Plugins by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/616
  • Redis by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/618
  • fix tests by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/619
  • Add auto refresh dropdown by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/620
  • Migrate queues to Horizon by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/621
  • Add app command/search by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/622
  • fix DO api connect by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/623
  • provision lighter servers by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/628
  • add custom path to site env by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/629
  • add postgresql 17 by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/630
  • Add two factor by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/632
  • customize server creation and bug fixes by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/646
  • fix ssl issues by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/647
  • Transfer servers between projects by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/648
  • Fix two factor authentication by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/649
  • Fix php dropdown by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/650
  • Bump form-data from 4.0.3 to 4.0.4 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/651
  • Bump @eslint/plugin-kit from 0.3.2 to 0.3.4 by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/652
  • fix 2fa confirmation by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/653
  • Add missing site aliases update by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/655
  • Fix server updates by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/657
  • Remove mysql 5.7 by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/658
  • fix plugins load issue by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/659
  • add nodejs/npm site type by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/661
  • fix broken docs links by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/663
  • fix isolated user ssh commands by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/666
  • add logs to the app page while installing by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/664
  • fix custom ssl validation by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/667
  • fix auto refresh issue by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/668
  • fix auto completion while using auto refresh by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/669
  • add new session button to console by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/670
  • disable auto refresh when browser is deactive by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/671
  • add search to data-table by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/672
  • fix s3 backup uploads by @saeedvaziry in https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/pull/674

Full Changelog: https://github.com/vitodeploy/vito/compare/2.6.0...3.0.0
